title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 100th Starlink flight of 2025
summary: SpaceX has launched more than 2,500 of its satellites so far this year. It’s targeting liftoff of its Falcon 9 rocket from pad 4E at Vandenberg Space Force Base on Friday during a window that opens at 1:41 p.m. PDT (4:41 p.m. EDT / 2041 UTC).

title: Turning up the heat in ESA’s Astronaut Reserve Training

summary:

title: Blue Origin test-fires New Glenn ahead of second launch
summary:
Blue Origin test-fired its second New Glenn rocket Oct. 30, one of the final milestones before a launch expected in November.

title: Seas of the Sun: The story of Cluster
summary: What began with tragedy ended in triumph. This is the untold story of the European Space Agency’s pioneering 25-year Cluster mission to study how invisible solar storms impact Earth's environment.

title: European Commission weighs inviting Ukraine to Europe’s GOVSATCOM platform
summary:
Krakow — The European Commission on Oct. 28 proposed that EU member states approve talks with Ukraine on its participation in its government satellite communication program, known as GOVSATCOM. The European Union’s GOVSATCOM platform is designed to provide secure satellite communication capabilities by pooling and sharing existing satellite resources from member states and accredited private […]
